title: ParallaxSection Smooth Scroll Animation
description: Verify that the ParallaxSection component creates smooth scaling animations for its child elements as the user scrolls through the page without any jitter or lag.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage containing the ParallaxSection component
Slowly scroll through the page to trigger ParallaxSection animations
Verify that child elements within the ParallaxSection scale smoothly and the animation is free of lag or jitter

title: ParallaxImage Mouse Movement Interaction
description: Test that the ParallaxImage component responds accurately to mouse movements by moving foreground and background images at different speeds.

steps.description: Navigate to the component containing the ParallaxImage
Move the mouse over the component in various directions and speeds
Verify foreground and background layers move at different speeds corresponding to mouse position changes without flickering or jumps

title: Horizontal Scrolling ProjectGrid with GSAP Animations
description: Validate that the ProductGrid component scrolls horizontally smoothly and GSAP ScrollTrigger animations trigger correctly at the specified scroll positions.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage ProductGrid section
Scroll horizontally through the project showcase area
Verify horizontal scrolling is fluid
Check animations trigger at intended scroll positions with smooth transitions

title: Hero Section Animated Background and Layout
description: Ensure the Hero section loads an animated background and content layout that appears as designed and without performance degradation.

steps.description: Load homepage and observe the Hero section on initial display
Verify animated background initiates correctly
Check that main content layout is present and animated content elements (e.g. text, graphics) appear smoothly

title: TextType Typing Animation Accuracy and Timing
description: Test the TextType component to verify the typing animation triggers, displays dynamically typed text correctly, and timing matches design specifications.

steps.description: Navigate to a page or component section using the TextType component
Observe the typing animation for dynamic text
Verify typing speed, pauses, and end timing correspond to design requirements

title: ProjectCard Display and Thematic Styling
description: Verify the Skateboard-themed ProjectCard renders correctly with all project information displayed as expected and styling matches the skateboard aesthetic consistently.

steps.description: Navigate to the ProductGrid or any location displaying ProjectCards
Check that all project cards show expected textual and visual content including images, titles, descriptions
Verify the skateboard theme styling including colors, fonts, and layout are consistent across all ProjectCards

title: ContactForm Input Validation and Submission
description: Ensure the ContactForm component accepts valid user inputs, validates form fields properly, rejects invalid data with error messages, and submits successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the ContactForm
Enter invalid data in all fields (e.g. empty, malformed email, special characters in text fields)
Attempt to submit the form
Validate appropriate error messages are displayed preventing form submission
Enter valid data in all mandatory fields
Submit the form
Confirm form submission succeeds and user receives a success confirmation

title: Lenis-based Smooth Scrolling Performance
description: Verify the smooth scrolling implementation powered by Lenis provides fluid scrolling behavior across the entire page, especially at the end of scroll areas, without lag or slowdown.

steps.description: Load the homepage
Scroll through the entire page from top to bottom at varying speeds
Verify scrolling is smooth with no noticeable jank, lag, or freezing including near the bottom of the page

title: Responsive Design Across Devices and Screen Sizes
description: Test UI elements and components render correctly and maintain usability across multiple screen sizes and device types including desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Access the website using various emulated device resolutions and physical devices
Verify all components including ParallaxSection, ProductGrid, Hero, ContactForm, and navigation adapt layouts and remain fully functional
Check for no content overlap, clipping, or broken styling caused by responsive design

title: Reusable Heading and ButtonLink Consistency
description: Verify the Heading and ButtonLink components are used consistently across the website providing uniform styling, correct sizes, and interaction behaviors.

steps.description: Browse through multiple pages and sections utilizing the Heading and ButtonLink components
Confirm headings use correct sizes and styles as defined in the reusable component
Check that all ButtonLink instances behave as clickable links with consistent styling and hover/focus states

title: ScrollTrigger GSAP Animation Trigger Points Accuracy
description: Validate GSAP ScrollTrigger animations start and end precisely at their intended scroll positions for all components using this library.

steps.description: Navigate to the ProductGrid and other animated sections on homepage
Scroll slowly through areas triggering GSAP animations
Verify animations start exactly when expected and complete according to design without premature or delayed triggering

title: Footer Component Rendering and Content Verification
description: Ensure the footer component is present at the bottom of the page with correct branding, navigation links, and consistent styling.

steps.description: Scroll to the bottom of the homepage
Verify footer is visible and correctly styled
Check that all expected links and branding elements are present and functional

title: Error Handling on Form Network Failure
description: Test ContactForm behavior when network issues prevent form submission, ensuring error messages are displayed and the user can retry.

steps.description: Fill in valid data in ContactForm
Simulate network failure or disconnect before submitting form
Attempt to submit the form
Confirm user is notified of submission failure with a clear error message
Reconnect network and resubmit form
Verify form submission succeeds after retry

title: Custom CSS and Animation Performance Optimization
description: Verify that custom CSS animations and Tailwind CSS utility-based styles do not cause performance degradation, slowdowns, or visual glitches, particularly when combined with complex scroll animations.

steps.description: Load pages implementing heavy CSS animations together with scroll and mouse-based animations
Scroll and interact with animations extensively
Confirm no dropped frames, jank, or performance bottlenecks occur during animations
